description.name: maticpolygon
description.tagline: Matic polygon Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto polygon-matic Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Matic polygon directly on your website
Unique polygon/matic receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your polygon/matic wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
